channel.title: labrador on Wayne Cater

item.title: four-legged-family
item.description: I remember that Sunday after church over nine years ago. We saw a man on the country road with a sign for free puppies. My wife had long wanted a dog. This would be the day! It was an easy right turn to take and stop. My wife, our son, and youngest daughter, and I got out of the family van. I asked the man if he had a boy. He had one left.
